# First decennium
```{r}
load("tech1.rda")
summary(tech1)
```

```{r}
ergm::mcmc.diagnostics(tech1)
```

```{r,warning=FALSE}
tech1.gof <- ergm::gof(tech1)
snafun::stat_plot_gof(tech1.gof)
```
